item.title: On July 23, Aurora Police Officer John Haubert brutally beat and...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

On July 23, Aurora Police Officer John Haubert brutally beat and nearly killed a young Latino man. In a highly uncharacteristic response, four days later, APD charged, arrested, and suspended Haubert and another officer who did not intervene. What accounts for the sudden change?

MUST-READ ANALYSIS: https://www.liberationnews.org/police-chief-orders-rare-ar‚Ä¶/

‚ÄúAll credit for the accountability we now see from APD is due to the people themselves. APD has not earned this community‚Äôs trust and we must remain vigilant and ready to mobilize. No promise from Chief Wilson will assure us that justice will be served for the criminal cop. We will continue to watch and take to the streets if needed. No justice, no peace!‚Äù

On July 27, the Aurora Police Department led an uncharacteristic arrest of two of their officers, John Haubert and Francine Martinez, on charges related to a violent arrest they had carried out four days earlier. During the day on July 23, Haubert and... #antiracism #AuroraColorado #denver

liberationnews.org

Police chief orders rare arrest of brutal officer in Aurora, CO...

On July 27, the Aurora Police Department led an uncharacteristic arrest of two of their officers, John Haubert and Francine Martinez, on charges related to a violent arrest they had carried out four days earlier. During the day on July 23, Haubert and... #antiracism #AuroraColorado #denverOn July 27, the Aurora Police Department led an uncharacteristic arrest of two of their officers, John Haubert and Francine Martinez, on charges related to a violent arrest they had carried out four days earlier. During the day on July 23, Haubert and... #antiracism #AuroraColorado #denver

item.title: LET CUBA LIVE! üåüüá®üá∫üåüüá®üá∫üåüThank you to everyone...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

LET CUBA LIVE! üåüüá®üá∫üåüüá®üá∫üåüThank you to everyone who joined us for our Liberation Forum last night on the achievements of the Cuban revolution and the US government's tireless efforts to overthrow it.

The Cuban people have fought and sacrificed for 62 years to maintain their sovereignty and continue their revolutionary process. They have made tremendous advances in the standard of living of millions of poor and working Cubans who only knew poverty, illiteracy, vicious racism, and ...exploitation under Spanish then US rule.

Today the US is once again intensifying its efforts to topple the Cuban government and return Cuba to servitude. All people who believe the Cuban people have a right to decide their own destiny‚Äînot the United States government‚Äîmust stand now and fight for Cuba!

Please stay tuned for future solidarity events and go right now to letcubalive.com to sign the letter calling on President Biden to lift the blockade on Cuba!

item.title: TONIGHT, 7PM! üåüüá®üá∫ Liberation Forum: Let Cuba Live! ‚≠ë...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

TONIGHT, 7PM! üåüüá®üá∫ Liberation Forum: Let Cuba Live! ‚≠ë Achievements of the Revolution & US Attempts to Overthrow It

We are excited to present this educational community event on the achievements of the Cuban revolution and the US government‚Äôs fight to overthrow it.

We will have homemade Cuban pastries and Cuban pizzas, posters, and stickers for donation benefiting Cuba solidarity work.

...

See you tonight at the Liberation Center! All attendees are asked to wear masks.

item.title: THIS FRIDAY, 7PM! Liberation Forum: Let Cuba Live! ‚≠ë...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

THIS FRIDAY, 7PM! Liberation Forum: Let Cuba Live! ‚≠ë Achievements of the Revolution & US Attempts to Overthrow It

üåüFEATURED SPEAKER: Gloria La Rivaüåü Activist, journalist & founding member of the PSL Gloria La Riva was awarded Cuba‚Äôs Friendship Medal in 2010 for her many years of Cuba solidarity. She was the coordinator of the National Committee to Free the Cuban Five, Cuban heroes unjustly imprisoned in the U.S. for defending Cuba from U.S.-sponsored terrorism. She had traveled to Cuba many times and reported extensively on the impacts of the US blockade on the Cuban people.
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: THIS FRIDAY! Liberation Forum: Let Cuba Live! ‚≠ë Achievements...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

THIS FRIDAY! Liberation Forum: Let Cuba Live! ‚≠ë Achievements of the Revolution & US Attempts to Overthrow It üåüüá®üá∫ Come learn about:

‚ú∞ The achievements of the Cuban revolution

‚ú∞ The history and tactics of US counterrevolution against Cuba - military invasions, terrorist attacks, covert operations, cultivating dissident artists, propaganda, media manipulation, assassination attempts, economic strangulation & more

...

‚ú∞ The situation in Cuba today - surviving COVID under the US blockade

‚ú∞ How we in the US can stand with the Cuban people

Plus food, posters, speakers, and community! Don‚Äôt miss it!

item.title: FRI JULY 30, 7PM ‚ú∞ Join us for a Liberation Forum on the...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

FRI JULY 30, 7PM ‚ú∞ Join us for a Liberation Forum on the achievements of the Cuban revolution and the long and sordid history of US attempts to overthrow it.

Now more than ever it is important to understand the real situation in Cuba.

Hear from speakers & discuss what we in the US can do to support the Cuban people.

...

We will have refreshments and art for sale to support solidarity efforts to send relief to Cuba as it suffers under the US blockade. Please come out!

item.title: Happy birthday Assata Shakur, born #OnThisDay 74 years ago! An...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Happy birthday Assata Shakur, born #OnThisDay 74 years ago! An anti-war activist and prominent member of the Black Panther Party and Black Liberation Army, Assata became a target of the FBI‚Äôs campaign against left-wing liberation groups.

She was falsely accused and convicted of shooting a police officer, despite lack of evidence. She escaped in 1979 and has been living in Cuba ever since the revolutionary government of Cuba has refused any requests from the US government to t...urn her over.

Today, Assata continues to inspire masses of young revolutionaries to fight for a better world. In her famous words:

‚ÄúIt is our duty to fight for our freedom.
It is our duty to win.
We must love each other and support each other.
We have nothing to lose but our chains.‚Äù
#AssataShakur #BlackLiberation #Cub

See More

item.title: How did the Taliban become the dominant force in Afghanistan? In...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

How did the Taliban become the dominant force in Afghanistan? In 1978, a government that aspired to socialism came to power in the country. Because it was aligned with the Soviet Union diplomatically, the US launched a covert war to destroy it. 40 years later Afghanistan is still ravaged by war. Today, instead of socialists, the Taliban is the dominant force.

The Socialist Program with Brian Becker did a two-part deep-dive on the history of Afghanistan, and it is essential listening to understand the situation today.
1 - https://soundcloud.com/‚Ä¶/the-real-story-when-us-empire-wage‚Ä¶
2 - https://soundcloud.com/‚Ä¶/is-the-us-actually-leaving-afghani‚Ä¶
